mapper.select: SELECT * FROM timetable_kg ORDER BY lecture_code
SELECT * FROM timetable_kg ttb JOIN temptable tb ON ttb.lecture_code=tb.lecture_code WHERE tb.user_email = #{email}

SELECT R.* FROM ( SELECT rank() over( partition by lecture_day, start_time order by RAN ) rank, RES.* FROM ( SELECT T.*, DBMS_RANDOM.VALUE RAN FROM timetable_kg T WHERE 1=1 AND department_name in ('정보통신공학과', '공통') AND ( lecture_day, start_time ) NOT IN ( SELECT distinct lecture_day, start_time FROM timetable_kg ttb JOIN temptable tb ON ttb.lecture_code=tb.lecture_code WHERE tb.user_email = #{id }) AND start_time between #{stime } and #{etime } ) RES ORDER BY DBMS_RANDOM.VALUE ) R WHERE rank = 1 AND rownum BETWEEN 1 AND #{classNum }
SELECT count(*) FROM temptable tb left join timetable_kg ttb on tb.lecture_code=ttb.lecture_code WHERE user_email= #{user_email } AND (start_time=#{start_time } and lecture_day=#{lecture_day })
